featured.text: The car doors were still locked, the windows tightly shut, and on the back seat were their two jackets.
Slowly, the door opened and the old man appeared.
The Kiddie Stool will swing out only when the cabinet door opens.
Then I locked all the doors and left.
The doors of these department stores slide open _____ when you approach them.

other.text: When he opened the door, he was (29) by what he saw.
These devices made it possible for doors to open by themselves and wine to flow magically out of statues’ mouths.

The first piece was set just high enough so that when it swung out horizontally from the cabinet door, the second piece would swing down from the first, just touching the ground, and so serving as a support for the first piece of the wood.
The empty boxes and many other things fell all over them the minute he opened the door.
Using metal hinges, Jeanie attached one piece of the wood to the front of the cabinet door, and the second piece to the first.
It swings from left to right to be attached to the cabinet door.
For your own , please don't open the door until the train fully stops.

definition.zh_def: 門，通常用於進出房間或建築物的開口。
definition.en_def: A movable barrier used to close off an entrance, typically consisting of a panel that swings on hinges or slides.
definition.example: She opened the door to let in some fresh air.
